description:
Brianne and her companions from Universe 2 reveal their more powerful forms. It’s time to see what they’re made of! Has No. 17 bitten off more than he can chew?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ai no Chikara ga Daibakuhatsu!? Dai 2 Uchuu Majokko Senshi!!
Eine Explosion der Liebe! – Die Kriegerhexen des 2. Universums greifen an!
The Power of Love Explodes?! Universe 2`s Little Witch Warriors!!
愛の力が大爆発!? 第2宇宙の魔女っ子戦士!!
